p: V. fauriei is also described as an antidepressant [ 37], vasorelaxant [ 71], and anxiolytic [ 72]. Yoon et al. [ 34] demonstrated its antinociceptive effects in a fibromyalgia animal model provoked by intermittent cold stress. Its effects in reducing the occurrence of prenatal depression and schizophrenia in rats were also reported [ 38].
